DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number of years indicating the use of pipe marijuana.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tube with a small bowl at one end, especially one used for smoking tobacco._Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)_A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tube with a small bowl at one end, especially one used for smoking tobacco.

Concepts.definition: A tube with a small bowl at one end, especially one used for smoking tobacco.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04):A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration of an event expressed in number of years._The period of time during which something continues._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
